rbtttl.defaultvalues: ,,,,,,,,,,,,,=[luong_cb]+[luong_nghi_phep]+[luong_thuong]+ [luong_lam_them]+[tien_an]+[pc_bh_tra]+[luong_khac],,=select ty_le/100 * [luong_cb] from nstl_dmckgt where ma ='BHXH',=select ty_le/100 * [luong_cb] from nstl_dmckgt where ma ='BHYT',=select ty_le/100 * [luong_cb] from nstl_dmckgt where ma ='doan_phi',=select ty_le/100 * [luong_cb] from nstl_dmckgt where ma ='BHTN',,,=[bhxh]+[bhyt]+[doan_phi]+[bhtn]+[thue_tncn]+[phi_khac] ![luong_cb],=[tong_luong] - [tam_ung] - [tong_phi] ![luong_cb]![thue_tncn]![phi_khac]![luong_nghi_phep]![luong_thuong]![luong_lam_them]![tien_an]![pc_bh_tra]![luong_khac]
